Key Arguments: The proposed legislation will erode the fundamental human right of freedom of speech.
Freedom of speech is essential for discovering truth and facilitating dialogue.
The internet serves as a modern 'town square' for debating ideas, and government should not be the arbiter of truth.
The bill would cause significant harm and should be rejected.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is the bedrock of a free and fair society.
The proposed bill will effectively halt this essential dialogue.
Setting up the government as the arbiter of truth is not the answer.
Freedom of speech is our God given right. You will have to answer to God when He returns.
